EmailTemplate.description: To notify community members that their registration has been declined
EmailTemplate.name: Community Member Rejection Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: Community Member Registration - Rejected
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
[Image alt text: RiseTogetherLogo] < https://ajsd-b-dev-ed.develop.my.site.com/RiseTogetherPortal > Hello {{{Community_Member__c.Last_Name__c}}},
Thank you for your interest in joining Rise Together.
After reviewing your registration, we regret to inform you that your application has {{{Community_Member__c.Approval_Status__c}}}at this time due to missing documentation or not meeting our eligibility criteria.
If you believe this is an oversight or would like to provide the necessary documentation, please contact us for assistance.
We appreciate your understanding and encourage you to reapply once all requirements are met.
Best regards,
Rise Together
RiseTogether < https://ajsd-b-dev-ed.develop.my.site.com/RiseTogetherPortalhttps:// >
